recipesJson.name: Sixes & Sevens
recipesJson.author: nks
recipesJson.description: A tobacco recipe.Simple,yet tasty and full.Ry4d is the main flavor,but instead of using 6-7 other flavors to add the necessary notes,in this recipe we only need these 3.Flapper pie adds a light bakery and vanilla cream part,caramel butter adds that sweet caramel buttery finish and white fudge adds a white chocolate undertone.

reviews.text: I really liked this, a great new take on simple RY4d recipe!
